bug.short_desc: Double-click on some project in project list doesn't work in Internet Explorer

long_desc.thetext:
Steps to reproduce: 1. Double click on some project in project list
Expected result: The xref of that project is opened.
Actual result: Nothing happens. Internet Explorer affected only.
Second issue I sometimes experience: 1. Have some previous query in form, e.g. an unsuccessful 2. Double click on some project in project list
Then, project is filled in "File Path"
3. Double click on another project
Then, project is also filled in "File Path", so I there is non-sence "/source/project-a/source/project-b"
Internet Explorer affected only.
I'm sorry I'm posting both issues into same bug but I guess it is caused by same reason. If not so, feel free to divide it to separate bug.
Used software: OpenGrok 0.10-rc, Apache Tomcat 6.0.29, Sun Java 6 1.6.0_20-b02, Debian GNU/Linux 5.0, Windows 7, IE8

changeset: 1136:1b722e4bc9e1
- note that this adds a bug for MacOSX with Safari, that the scroll list on project list can be double clicked too (and will most probably not work as expected ;) )
